data.md:MetaData: Ceilometer raw data measured at Neumayer station (2013-11), links to files

BSRN station no: 13, Surface type: iceshelf, Topography type: flat, rural, Horizon from 1992 to 2009-01: doi:10.1594/PANGAEA.669516, Horizon after 2009-01: doi:10.1594/PANGAEA.757811, Station scientist: Holger Schmithüsen (Holger.Schmithuesen@awi.de). Station description see hdl:10013/epic.28566.d001
All CL51 raw data sets from Neumayer Station (2013-11) in one zip archive (448 MB)
